name: Mahjongg The Ultimate Collection 2
description:
Includes 15 exciting and unique Mahjongg game variations in one collection. Enjoy the following games:

  • Traditional tile matching gameplay with 100 unique layouts.
  • Solitaire variations such as Doubles, Flip It, Hide and Peek, Golden Dragon, Freecell, Ten Spot, and Countdown.
  • 25 double-sized layouts with twice the tiles.
  • Go head-to-head in two player mode.
  • Other fun variations like Nanjing, Four Rivers, Waterfalls, Memory, and Collapse.


Features relaxing gameplay that's fun for the whole family.

  • 30 beautiful tile sets.
  • Modern interface with easy-to-use design.
  • Track your high score, best times, and in-game achievements.
  • 150 backgrounds to choose from.
  • Layout Editor to create your own levels.
